column1: '''Lisgardh''' was a fenland region at the [[Mouths of Sirion]] consisting of large areas where reeds and rushes grew Man-high.<ref>{{UT
In an earlier version, ''Lisgardh'' was called ''Arlisgion'', "the place of reeds".<ref>{{LT2
column2: IIIn}}, Sec. 3 ''Miscellaneous Matters'', (i) ''The geography of The Fall of Gondolin'', p. 217</ref>
